content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position(0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input, producing iron plates
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input, producing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production at Position(4,4)
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) with coal fuel, currently idle with no ingredients but has produced copper plates previously

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5,24.5)
An incomplete power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5)
The system is currently not operational as components are not properly connected and the boiler lacks fuel

### Research Facility
- Lab (position not specified) loaded with automation science packs, currently not powered

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities (e.g., stone furnace, offshore pump)

### Recipe and Technology Requirements
- Research required technologies before attempting to craft items (e.g., assembling-machine-1 requires automation technology)
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft complex items

### Furnace Operation Errors
- Cannot insert different ore types into furnaces that already contain another type of ore
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ore to operate effectively

### Power System Connection Errors
- Have required connection items (like pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect entities
- Ensure power generation components are properly connected in sequence (pump → boiler → steam engine)

### Resource Management
- Maintain adequate supplies of basic materials (coal, iron plates, etc.) for crafting and fuel
- Plan resource usage to have enough materials for complex crafting chains
